thread.section_title: Alhambra Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Small, clean, inexpensive
thread.title_full: Small, clean, inexpensive - Review of Alhambra Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Allen H
title: Small, clean, inexpensive
text:
We chose this spot for a single night for its location next to both King's Cross and Pancras stations. It is a small room for two people, but maybe your Yoga practice will come in handy. There are four Indian food restaurants around the corner on Euston Street. We chose the closest one and the food was delicious. The architecturally beautiful Pancras Station will remind you of Hogwarts and to venture a bit further with Harry Potter, you can see most of "Platform 9 3/4" at King's Cross station.
Room Tip: Our room overlooked Argyle Street, but it is a quiet street. See more room tips
